revised_title: The Photographic Spectrum of Electrolytic Iron: A Comparative Study
tldr: This article investigates the photographic arc spectrum of electrolytic iron and compares it with the solar spectrum. The author, J. Norman Lockyer, uses electrolytically deposited iron to create a more accurate and pure spectrum for comparison. The study is important for solar and stellar work, as it helps establish a reliable comparison for further research.
